name: Space Numbers (Maeda Desenvolvedor)
description:
I developed this demo game for a programming subject from FIAP, a brazilian university. The students had to make a game based on old Atari/Arcade game, but with some changes. 

I took Space Invaders and thought  about a game that the player could practice Math while playing the good old-school shooter. The ideia here is to hit the aliens using divisible numbers. I also implemented a prime number power up when the player hit the red spaceship. 

Space Number runs on PC and it was created with Unity Engine. 

Language: Portuguese.
